title: Illubeline
body:
History

The Age of Creation

When the three Spirits came to be shortly after the creation of the planet, Illubeline resided above the clouds.

The Age of Empires

Fenraye Huddah chose the Illubeline's orb when the three Spirits revealed themselves to him at the top of the Golian Ridge.
preface: Illubeline is the Golden Spirit; the Spirit of Essence or Existence as a whole.
